name: mesosphere/dcos-centos-virtualbox
description: Base image on which to install Mesosphere DCOS on VirtualBox

versions.description_markdown:
Smaller image:
- zeroed /empty, /tmp/whitespace, /boot/whitespace, and swap
- wiped bash history
- wiped install log
- compressed harder (level 9)

First release of dcos-centos-virtualbox!

Based on CentOS-7-x86_64-DVD-1511 with a yum upgrade on 2016-01-22.

Includes all the dependencies necessary to install DCOS, but does not include DOCS itself.

For more info about DCOS, see https://mesosphere.com
